articles.title: Sky Italia Invests in Cloud-Native Infrastructure
articles.summary: In a strategic move to enhance operational efficiency, Sky Italia is migrating key business systems to cloud-native platforms. The transformation is expected to reduce costs and improve scalability.

articles.title: Sky Italia Reports Strong Financial Performance
articles.summary: Sky Italia has reported solid financial results for the quarter, with revenue growth driven by strong performance in core business areas. The company reaffirmed its commitment to investing in technology and innovation.

articles.title: Sky Italia Announces Strategic Partnership to Expand Services
articles.summary: Sky Italia has formed a strategic partnership aimed at expanding its service offerings and reaching new markets. The collaboration will leverage complementary strengths to deliver enhanced value to customers.
